description:
A slimline design tucks out of the way until you need it. With its lightweight skeletonized handle and one of the best locks available, the Paraframe Nailnick Knife is an easy way to cut weight from your EDC without losing functionality.

  • Tanto blade excels at push-cuts, great for zip ties or pesky packaging
  • 420HC blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Titanium nitride finish improves corrosion resistance of the high-carbon steel
  • Framelock provides a solid lock that helps keeps you safe
  • Slim design carries well
  • Lightweight skeletonized handle
  • Pocket clip is set up for right-handed tip-up carry
name: Gerber Mini Paraframe Black Fine Edge Tanto Folding
